DOC.brief_summary: A randomized pilot study conduct , goal determine format represent viable approach behavioral weight loss treatment 18-25 year old . Specifically , participant randomize one three arm ; arm receive 12-week behavioral weight loss intervention , include identical dietary , physical activity , weight loss prescription .
DOC.brief_title: Recruiting Retaining Young Adults Behavioral Weight Loss Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized pilot study conduct , goal determine format represent viable approach behavioral weight loss treatment 18-25 year old . Specifically , participant randomize one three arm ; arm receive 12-week behavioral weight loss intervention , include identical dietary , physical activity , weight loss prescription . Behavioral goal / prescription , basic content deliver also ; format intervention deliver differ among treatment arm . A total 45-55 participant , 18-25 year age , BMI 25 45 kg/m2 randomize one three group : 1 ) Face-to-face brief behavioral weight loss ( FBWL ) , 2 ) Web-based brief behavioral weight loss ( WBWL ) , 3 ) Web-based brief behavioral weight loss PLUS optional group session ( WBWL Plus ) . Assessments take place 0 ( baseline ) , 3 ( post-treatment ) , 6 month ( follow-up ) .

Currently receive treatment Type 2 Diabetes , hypertension , hyperlipidemia , report history cardiovascular disease . 2 . Other health problem may influence ability walk physical activity associate unintentional weight change , include cancer treatment within past 5 year tuberculosis . 3 . Report history , current diagnose DSMIVTR eat disorder ( i.e. , anorexia nervosa bulimia nervosa ) current compensatory behavior ( e.g. , vomit , laxative use , excessive exercise ) . 4 . Report heart condition , chest pain period activity rest , loss consciousness Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire ( PARQ ) . Individuals endorse joint problem , prescription medication usage , medical condition could limit exercise require obtain write physician consent participate . 5 . Report history psychotic disorder , bipolar disorder , organic brain syndrome ; report hospitalization psychiatric disorder within last 12 month . 6 . Are currently participate weight loss program and/or take weight loss medication . 7 . Lost > 5 % body weight past 6 month history bariatric surgery . 8 . Participation research study may interfere study . 9 . Intend move outside surround area within time frame investigation town / unavailable three week initial intervention period . 10 .
